ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cvlatcvr1.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |

| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0. ` K ) = ( 0. ` K ) |
| 9 | 7, 8, 3 | #P_atnem0 | |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P =/= Q <-> ( P ( meet ` K ) Q ) = ( 0. ` K ) ) ) |

| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 12 | 11, 3 | #P_atbase | |- ( P e. A -> P e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 1, 7, 8, 2, 3 | #P_cvlcvrp | |- ( ( ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. CvLat ) /\ P e. ( Base ` K ) /\ Q e. A ) -> ( ( P ( meet ` K ) Q ) = ( 0. ` K ) <-> P C ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) |
